metadata.name: wavWRLD presents: wavROOM feat. TAROT
metadata.description:
The wavROOM experiences are token-curated intimate performances only open to the collectors of that artist. This 3-of-7 performance is with the gorgeous indie pop sag, TAROT @tarotsings.

These are the first live music performances minted on the blockchain.

wavWRLD partnered with Reveel & Glass.xyz to record & mint the performances.

Video, Editing & Color by LadiDadi @ladidadilive
Audio, Mix & Master by Invictus @theoginvictus

About the Artist:

Jordyn Benedict, aka TAROT, is a Nashville-based indie pop, alternative r&b artist, and songwriter utilizing the tools of web3 to expand her music career and pave her own path. The 24-year-old sold her first NFTs by minting 28 tokens every day in February â€” all of which contained a new song written, produced, mixed, and mastered by Jordyn herself.

"I believe in alignment and I believe I was led to this career path because connecting and creating with others for a greater purpose than myself is what brings me fulfillment." -TAROT
